hero.title: Vasilis Totskas
hero.name: Vasilis Totskas
hero.description: Fullstack Developer focused on Nuxt, Python, and Kubernetes/Docker. From e-commerce platforms to self-hosted k3s kubernetes clusters — I build it end to end.

portfolio.name: Developer Portfolio
portfolio.description: Terminal-themed portfolio built with Next.js 16, React 19, and Tailwind CSS v4. Features i18n, Spotify integration, and GitHub stats.

grooveshop.name: GrooveShop E-commerce
grooveshop.description: Multi-repo e-commerce platform built over 4+ years. Django REST API, Nuxt 4 storefront, and a NestJS media streaming service. Running on PostgreSQL with Docker orchestration.

advisable.description: Working on complex web applications, modernizing stacks and delivering projects on standalone Php/Typescript/Python and Nuxt 4 frontends.

freelance.description: Designed and developed websites and web applications.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: // README.md
about.intro: Hey there, I'm Vasilis, a Fullstack Developer based in Athens, Greece, with a strong focus on high-performance web applications and scalable infrastructure.

work.title: Current Work @ Advisable
work.body: I am working on complex web applications, always striving to modernize our stacks. I've also worked on standalone Php/Typescript/Python stacks, delivering complex projects for our clients, including comprehensive platforms frontend built entirely on Nuxt 4.

projects.title: Projects & Infrastructure
projects.bodyBefore: For more than 4 years, alongside with other projects I've been working on a personal project, a multi-repo e-commerce platform consisting of a Django API, Nuxt frontend, and a NestJs media streaming application. I've recently built a microservices-based infrastructure for
projects.bodyAfter: , running on a self-hosted Hetzner k3s kubernetes cluster, including ArgoCD, Longhorn, RabbitMQ, Celery, Redis, and Cert-Manager.

stack.title: Core Tech Stack
stack.frontend: Vue.js, Nuxt.js (v3/v4), JavaScript, TypeScript, NestJs, Vite, HTML, CSS
stack.devops: Kubernetes (k3s), ArgoCD, Docker, RabbitMQ, Celery, Redis, Postgres, Hetzner, Cloudflare

ai.title: AI
ai.body: I've been an early and ongoing user of AI coding tools like Claude Code (Main tool), Cursor, Windsurf, and Kiro.

about.closing: With a strong interest in clean architecture and driven by curiosity, I always strive to stay on the edge of all frameworks and tools I'm working with.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: // reach out
contact.description: Thanks for reaching out! I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
